thread.title: BREAKING: High street evacuated after unexploded WW2 BOMB discovered in Shoreditch
thread.title_full: BREAKING: High street evacuated after unexploded WW2 BOMB discovered in Shoreditch

title: BREAKING: High street evacuated after unexploded WW2 BOMB discovered in Shoreditch
text: London street evacuated after unexploded WW2 BOMB discovered in Shoreditch London street evacuated after unexploded WW2 BOMB discovered in Shoreditch A BUSY London high street has been evacuated after an unexploded World War Two bomb was allegedly discovered. PUBLISHED: 09:28,  34, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 TWITTER Shoreditch High Street has been closed off to the public Shoreditch High street has been closed off at the junction by Shoreditch church this morning after police reportedly found a supcious device. Police are at the scene to investigate the bomb scare and shops have been evacuated. This is a breaking news story. Express.co.uk will be bring you the latest updates and devlopments. Please refresh your page for the most up to date information. More to follow...
